summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC, associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It details the charges for transportation and handling, along with payment instructions. The invoice indicates a total charge of $48.89, with a due date of June 25, 2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the sender for a shipment associated with NYSG LLC, indicating his involvement in shipping activities.

persons.name: Janos Kornai
persons.context: Janos Kornai is mentioned as the recipient of a package sent by Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a connection between the two individuals.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein sent a package to Janos Kornai, indicating a shipping relationship.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery, associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 10, 2005, and details shipping charges for services rendered by FedEx.
Total charges amount to $48.89, with a due date for payment set for June 25, 2005.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sender of a package to Janos Kornai in Budapest.
The invoice indicates a fuel surcharge and discounts applied to the total charges.
The document includes instructions for requesting invoice adjustments.
